com.joc.jguii

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joc.jguii.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    Object for manipulating external applications.

    Used to open, focus and close external applications as well as click on any of its points. Usually only used through ApplicationHandler.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int id
      Window id for this Application.
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the bin that is executed and name in titlebar of window that is used in windowSearch.
      private java.util.ArrayList<NamedPoint> points
      Points specified for this Application in the config file.
      private java.lang.Process proc
      This Application's Process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Application

        public Application(java.lang.String name,
           java.util.ArrayList<NamedPoint> points)
        Object for manipulating external applications.

        Used to open, focus and close external applications as well as click on any of its points. Usually only used through ApplicationHandler. Calls start() and getInitId()

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the bin that is executed and the string that is used to search for the window.
        points - The list of points that can be clicked on.
        See Also:
        ApplicationHandler

    • Method Detail

      • windowSearch

        private int windowSearch(java.lang.String search)
        Search for a window with search in its title.

        Native method to return the window id of a window that has the String search in its title.

        Parameters:
        search - The string to search for.
        Returns:
        The id of the window or -1 if none is found.

      • setWindowFocus

        private void setWindowFocus(int id)
        Sets the currently focused application to id.

        Sets the currently focused application to the window that has id id.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the window to focus.

      • start

        private void start()
        Starts the Application.

        Starts the Application by executing the binary located at: "/usr/bin/" with the name name.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the application.

        Closes the Application by destroying its process.

      • focus

        public void focus()
        Focuses and raises the application.

      • getInitId

        private int getInitId()
        Retrieves the window id of this application just after it has been initially started.

        Searches for it every second until it is found.

        Returns:
        the window id of this Application.

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Gets the window id of this application.
        Returns:
        The window id of this Application.

      • getPoint

        public java.awt.Point getPoint(int i)
        Gets the point at index i.
        Parameters:
        i - The index to get.
        Returns:
        The point at index i.

      • getPoint

        public java.awt.Point getPoint(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the point with name name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to search for.
        Returns:
        The point with name name or null if none is found.
